paragraphs.body: Earthbending-powered tanks are multi-segmented tracked vehicles powered by four earthbenders. Articulated in the middle, the tanks can rear up and crush objects in their way. The treads are made of plates of earth strung together by a metal wire, allowing the earthbenders to control the tank. These vehicles can house many troops and cross almost any terrain. Their armor is highly resistant to fire, making them ideal for assaults on enemy positions.
